timeline.author: agilob

timeline.bodyText: Arrays.asList use set to remove duplicates
timeline.author: agilob

replies.bodyText:
I didn't want to change the original code that List uses.
Do you think this is "necessary"?
replies.author: UnleashSpirit

replies.bodyText: Using stream and distinct to avoid duplicates and potentiel side effect of using Set
replies.author: UnleashSpirit

replies.bodyText: From performance perspective stream.distinct is many times slower than loading things to hashset.
replies.author: agilob

replies.bodyText:
So something like String[] -> Set -> List
new ArrayList<>(Sets.newHashSet(additionalAnnotationsList.trim().split("\\s*(;|\\r?\\n)\\s*")))
replies.author: UnleashSpirit

timeline.bodyText: 0 tests for this. please add tests for ; and the new splitting characters too (including \r\n and \n
timeline.author: agilob

replies.author: UnleashSpirit

replies.bodyText: Well, I add a getter for additionalModelTypeAnnotations to test the list easily
replies.author: UnleashSpirit
